pkgmetadata.longdescription: # scex_pyPython wrapper for SCEX - Loan calculation package## Pre-commitRun the below command to install the pre-commit hooks:```bash$ poetry run pre-commit install```To execute the hooks without making any commit:```bash$ poetry run pre-commit run --all-files```## Usage```>>> from scex_py.scex_client import ScexClient>>> client = ScexClient("host", "api_key")>>> client.process_equal_payment_loan({ "LoanDate": "2020-02-02", # Year-month-date "PmtDate": "2020-02-02", # Year-month-date "IntStartDate": "2020-02-02", # Year-month-date "Proceeds": 20000, "Term": 5, "IntRate": 10, "TotalDown": 2000 })```
